nodes.text: Palitoy was a toy company founded in 1909 by Alfred Edward Pallett in England. It was purchased by the toy company Hasbro in the 1990s. Palitoy distributed Kenner's lines of toys in the UK. In its advertisements, Palitoy created non-canon comic strips, featuring the Palitoy Cantina, the Palitoy Droid Factory and the Land of the Jawas.
